esp:image.description: LAK 25, from A. Deimel, Liste der Archaische Keilschriftzeichen.

body.p: OSL Provides a global registry of sign names, variants and readings for use by Oracc.
You can browse or search the signlist here.
You can learn how to report a new sign or value here.
You can view/download the OSL source file directly from the github repository.
OSL is managed by Niek Veldhuis at UC Berkeley and Steve Tinney at the University of Pennsylvania.
